tools.description: Tool to retrieve a specific section by its ID. Use when you have a section ID and need its metadata before display or update.

section_id.description:
The ID of the section to retrieve.
Example: "2995104339"

tools.name: get_special_backups
tools.description: Tool to list special backup archives for the user. Use when you need to retrieve all project backups for the authenticated user after creating or managing projects.

tools.name: get_task
tools.description: Tool to retrieve a specific task by its ID. Use when you need to fetch all details of an existing task before processing or display.

task_id.description:
The ID of the task to retrieve.
Example: "2203306141"

tools.name: list_archived_workspace_projects
tools.description: Tool to list all archived projects in a workspace. Use when you need to retrieve archived workspace projects with optional filters or pagination.

limit.description:
Limit the number of returned projects.
Example: 50

project_ids.description:
List of project IDs to filter the results.
Example: ["123456789","987654321"]

since.description:
Return archived projects updated after this datetime (ISO 8601).
Example: "2023-01-01T00:00:00Z"

until.description:
Return archived projects updated before this datetime (ISO 8601).
Example: "2023-02-01T00:00:00Z"

tools.name: list_filters
tools.description: Tool to list all filters for the authenticated user. Use when you need to retrieve the current set of custom filters.

sync_token.description:
Token for incremental sync. Use '*' for full sync.
Example: "*"

tools.name: list_pending_workspace_invitations
tools.description: Tool to list pending invitation emails in a workspace. Use when you need to check which email invites are still pending acceptance in a workspace.

workspace_id.description:
ID of the workspace to list pending invitations for.
Example: "1234567890"

tools.name: reopen_task
tools.description: This tool reopens previously completed task.

task_id.description:
The ID of the task to reopen.
Example: "2995104339"

tools.name: update_comment
tools.description: Tool to update a specific comment's content. Use when you need to correct or clarify an existing comment after confirming its ID and the new text.

comment_id.description:
The ID of the comment to update.
Example: "12345"

content.description:
New text content for the comment.
Example: "Updated comment content."

tools.name: update_project
tools.description: Tool to update a specific project's attributes such as name, color, indent, and order. Use when you need to rename or reorder a project after reviewing its current settings. Example: "Update project 2203306141 name to 'Q1 Goals'."

color.description:
New color ID for the project.
Example: 30

indent.description:
New indent level for the project (1-4).
Examples:
  1
  2
  3
  4

name.description:
New name for the project.
Example: "Q1 Planning"

order.description:
New order position for the project.
Examples:
  1
  2
  3

project_id.description:
The ID of the project to update.
Example: "2203306141"

tools.name: update_section
tools.description: Tool to update a specific section's attributes such as name and order. Use when you need to rename or reorder a section after confirming its ID.

name.description:
New name for the section. If omitted, the name remains unchanged.
Example: "Sprint Backlog"

order.description:
New position of the section within its project (0 is first).
Examples:
  0
  1

section_id.description:
The ID of the section to update.
Example: "7025"

tools.name: update_task
tools.description: Tool to update an existing task's properties. Use when you need to modify a task's details after confirming its ID and new values.

assignee_id.description:
User ID to assign the task to.
Example: "1234567"

content.description:
New content for the task.
Example: "Buy groceries and snacks"

description.description:
New description for the task.
Example: "Include fruits and vegetables"

due_date.description:
Due date in YYYY-MM-DD format.
Example: "2023-12-31"

due_datetime.description:
Due date and time in RFC3339 format.
Example: "2023-12-31T17:00:00Z"

due_lang.description:
Language code for parsing `due_string`, e.g., 'en'.
Examples:
  "en"
  "fr"
  "de"

due_string.description:
Human-readable due date string, e.g., 'tomorrow at 12:00'.
Example: "tomorrow at 17:00"

labels.description:
List of label names to assign to the task.
Example: ["Food","Shopping"]

task_id.description:
The ID of the task to update.
Example: "2995104339"
